name: 止境 Ends
description:
*A soul like 2D action game, in which attacks do not consume physical strength, instead, it is more interactive with the enemy
*It has 16 weapon types and more than 90 weapon types, each of which has its own advantages. Choose the weapon that suits you and defeat the ultimate enemy!
*Explore unknown areas and increase your collection
*Match different talents and skills to defeat opponents
*Continuous moves of skilled weapons do not give monsters a chance to breathe
*Difficult anti missile system, but extremely profitable
